text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ever since I was a little girl, I loved going to Tomakomai Port. It was so cool to see the huge ships approaching the massive port as if they were breaking the sea.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: The wide surface of Lake Utonai, reflecting the sky, is also beautiful.…… I always lose track of time when I see the migratory birds relaxing there.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: The people in town are nice and when I went to visit them, they brought me freshly made haskap jam.…… There are many parks. I remember playing there all day long.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: It is a…… very, very nice town. But still, more and more stores are closing their shutters little by little……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: That is Tomakomai City.…… is my dear hometown.

text_block_list.name: Haskap Farm Owner
text_block_list.text: ―When I heard that she was going to live in the country by herself, I couldn't help but do something about it. I made a business card for Tarumae-chan.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: What? A business card?

text_block_list.name: Haskap Farm Owner
text_block_list.text: What Tarumae-chan is striving for is to connect with people. You need to find many people who can help you.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much……! I will treasure it! You gave me so many haskaps, and you even made me a business card……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ……I also received a tusk from everyone at yesterday's farewell party……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I'll do my best! I will definitely make Tomakomai more exciting!
One day, some time after arriving at Tracen Academy, I saw a small crowd of people in front of the train station.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Oh, Tomakomai, the white earth, the paper dances Oh, Tomakomai, the migratory birds have a good night ……♪

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… That's all, it was "Come on, Tomakomai" written and composed by Hokko Tarumae～!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Thank you♪ Tokyo is so warm to have people stop by like this.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Once again―a paper winged migratory bird from the port of Tomakomai! I love hokki-gai☆ I am Tomakomai's locodol, Hokko Tarumae♪

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Actually, I just came to Tracen Academy this spring, so I still don't know much. Hehe. Nice to meet you.
I don't know if there was ever a girl on campus with that kind of vibe……? I wonder, and somehow stop in my tracks.

text_block_list.name: Passerby A
text_block_list.text: You are a good singer. Her atmosphere is pure and cute. It will be a good healing for my holiday.
And now people are waiting for the next song, whether they realize it or not. It began―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Well, next up is the…… Tomakomai Quiz! The Yufutsu River, a second class river, flows through Tomakomai! What is the name of the main stream that joins it?

text_block_list.name: Passersby
text_block_list.text: …… What?
It was a quiz competition.
And after that―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Next, we will learn about the history of Tomakomai♪ Tomakomai was settled in the Meiji Era…

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: The resources of abundant water and plentiful forests led to the development of the paper industry. Tomakomai produces a lot of newsprint!

text_block_list.name: Passerby B
text_block_list.text: I… I see……?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Next, we should learn about Tomakomai's specialties. I've compiled a list of recommended stores in this booklet.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: More and more stores are offering frozen delivery, so everyone can buy one. So, each one of you can take one home!

text_block_list.name: Passerby A
text_block_list.text: Oh, um, you don't sing anymore? I was thinking I'd like to hear some more……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Um…… sorry! I don't have any more songs ready! But! Instead, we're having a Tomakomai haskap tasting right now!

text_block_list.name: Passerby A
text_block_list.text: Ta… tasting event?…… I see.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I love these haskaps. They bring me so much, but this is the last one because I love them so much.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I hope you guys like it too! Here's one for you!
I take the haskap as prompted and throw it into my mouth. It is fresh and tart with a hint of sweetness.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I know, right? It's also great as a jam. Everyone else too…

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Eh, what! Everyone is gone……! Ah, I did it again ……
The live music success…… but after the tasting event, the event ended with an indescribable atmosphere.
The singing was lovely, she always tried her best to liven up the place, and the haskaps were excellent, but… the world is harsh.
A few days later―
I cannot forget the taste of the haskaps I had at a tasting the other day. But apparently, they are hard to find in supermarkets in Honshu.
When I opened the booklet that Hokko Tarumae gave me, I found the contact information for the store that sold the haskap that I had eaten at the tasting was clearly listed.

text_block_list.name: Haskap Farm Owner
text_block_list.text: 『Well, well, well! Tarumae-chan live on the street! She's really working hard, isn't she?』

text_block_list.name: Haskap Farm Owner
text_block_list.text: 『……How was she? She's a serious girl, so I was kind of worried.'』
choice_data_list: It was a trial and error situation.

text_block_list.name: Haskap Farm Owner
text_block_list.text: 『I see.……She is working really hard to achieve her dreams.』

text_block_list.name: Haskap Farm Owner
text_block_list.text: 『We can't lose either. Actually, she's inspired us so much that we've recently started working on social media.』

text_block_list.name: Haskap Farm Owner
text_block_list.text: 『Ah, I'm sorry, I'm rambling on and on. A box of haskaps right?.』
The haskaps that arrived at a later date did indeed taste fresh and had a…… "10% off" ticket in it.
